name: Spotted Leopard Sculpture - Dark Gold & Black
description: Add a chic touch to your decor with this modern sculpture Crafted from resin, it is shaped like a leopard with a geometric pattern. The base of the sculpture is gold while the different facets are spotted in black to give it an abstract yet natural look. It has a uniquely luxurious look as the facets have been cleverly placed to highlight the remarkable details of the leopard. An elegant addition to any space, make it a centerpiece for your coffee-table or an eye-catching accent for your office. This leopard sculpture also makes for an attractive gift to animal-loving friends and family Dimensions L 36.3 cm, W 8.5 cm, H 17.5 cm Material Resin Comes packed in a brown box Product Content 1 Sculpture About the brand Enhabit focuses on curating a range of simple yet stylish decor accents &amp tableware items that are effortlessly easy to add to your home. The label has been conceptualized &amp developed by our team to provide customers access to a wider range of modern homeware &amp decor accents at affordable prices. MRP Rs.2899.00 (inclusive of all taxes)

name: Laguna Bottle Vase Medium - Clear Yellow
description: Blending modern styles with vintage inspiration, this vase is a chic accent for your home Crafted from high-quality glass, it has a classic bottle-like shape with a dual color style that gives it a unique look. The top half of the bottle features a honey-yellow color, while the bottom half is left clear. This contrast of colors creates a visual depth that makes this vase a stunning accent with or without flowers. You can also personalise this vase by adding river pebbles or crystals inside for a bohemian look Dimensions Max Dia. 11 cm, Mouth Dia. 3.5 cm, H 26 cm Material Borosilicate Glass Made in India Clean with a dry cloth Comes packed in a brown box Product Content 1 Vase About the brand Launched in 2021, ESQ Living is a homeware label developed by the team at MQ. The collection offers minimal and stylish accessories with a focus on functionality &amp affordable luxury. Contemporary yet timeless designs are paired with subtle tones to create products that are ideal for the modern Indian home. MRP Rs.1699.00 (inclusive of all taxes)

name: Isla Glass Vase Medium - Shaded Blue
description: Elevate your floral displays with the Isla Glass Vase Medium. Crafted from delicate glass, this beauty enhances your space both with and without flowers. The narrow-neck design adds elegance to your floral arrangements, while the subtle touch of colour adds sophistication to your home. Whether decorating your home with vibrant fresh blooms or artificial arrangements, this Isla Glass Vase is perfect for versatile décor. name: Dachshund Sculpture Medium - Dull Gold
description: Showcase your love for dogs with this playful sculpture Crafted to resemble the adorable dachshund or wiener dog, it has been intricately sculpted to capture the breeds distinctive traits. From the floppy ears to the short little legs, this sculpture is the perfect way to honor your four-legged family. Colored in a gold hue, the face and body has been delicately shaded to bring a delightful life to this dog sculpture. Standing on all fours, the paws have foam pads to protect your surfaces from scratches. This sculpture also makes for an excellent gift to dachshund-parents Dimensions L 28.5 cm, W 10 cm, H 16.5 cm Material Polyresin Clean with a dry cloth Comes packaged in a brown box Product Content 1 Sculpture About the brand Enhabit focuses on curating a range of simple yet stylish decor accents &amp tableware items that are effortlessly easy to add to your home. name: Estonia Dual-Toned Glass Vase Medium - Cobalt
description: Subtly elegant with a timeless look, this vase is a stunning addition to any space Crafted from high-quality glass, it has a modern cylindrical shape with a cinched detail in the center that divides the vase into two halves. Each half has a different glass treatment to give it an elegant dual-textured look. The top half of the vase has a clear style with a brickwork pattern in a translucent cobalt-blue hue. The bottom half has been sandblasted to give it a a unique texture that is smooth to the touch with a sleek cobalt color. This beautiful vase is perfect for housing both vase fillers and fresh flowers, or to just be a standalone decor accent in your home Dimensions H 22 cm, Mouth Dia. 14.5 cm, Max Dia. 15 cm Material Glass Made in India Clean with a dry cloth Comes packed in a brown box Product Content 1 Vase About the brand Launched in 2021, ESQ Living is a homeware label developed by the team at MQ. name: Hunting Crane Sculpture Large - Gold
description: Bring a safari-chic vibe to your decor with this beautiful sculpture It beautifully captures the grace of an Asian crane, with intricately detailed sculpting and texture. Showing a moment of concentration, the crane is carefully examining the ground for its prey waiting to strike. Standing on a craggy base that resembles its natural habitat, this crane sculpture radiates a sense of calm focus. Colored in a modern gold hue, the cranes feathers and face have been carefully detailed to bring a lifelike aura to this animal sculpture. The base is also lined in a black suede to prevent scratches to your delicate surfaces. name: Scented Potpourri Medium - Rose Champagne
description: This scented potpourri is made from a carefully curated blend of dried flowers, herbs, and spices that have been delicately infused with the vibrant scent of roses and bubbly. The result is a subtle yet captivating aroma that has bright and sweet notes. The potpourri is the perfect decorative accent for any room. Use it to freshen up your living room, bedroom, or bathroom, or give it a thoughtful gift to loved ones. name: Scented Potpourri in Glass Jar - Rose

Perfect for setting up your living-room décor or adding a sense of vibrancy in your rooms. The complex rose scent of the potpourri is contained within the jar that you can open as needed. name: Fir Tree Tealight Holder & Sculpture Medium
description: The Fir Tree Tealight Holder &amp Sculpture is a cute addition to any space. If a tealight is lit inside, a yellowish glow comes like a light that shines through snow-covered branches, this fir tree is sure to bring Christmas into your home. It has a curved plate at the bottom which can be used to put the tealight. The tree itself can be lifted from the base for easy removal of the tealight. This handmade timeless tealight holder can remain standing all year round and make dark evenings a little more beautiful. Great for living rooms and bedrooms. Even without a tealight, this sculpture is sure to bring added flair to your living space. Combine this with the Fir Tree Tealight Holder &amp Sculpture in a larger size for a coordinated and stylish collection. Dimensions H 15.5 cm, Dia. 12.5 cm Material Porcelain Item Code 90747 Comes packed in a branded box Product Content 1 Tealight Holder &amp Sculpture 1 complimentary tealight included About the Brand Based in Bochum, Germany, Rader was started in 1968 by Hartmut Rader who handcrafted unique small products in his own workshop. Since its inception Rader has grown to become a leader in gifts and living accessories. Its tagline Design Stories resonates with its philosophy of creating designs that have lot of thought and love behind them. Winner of multiple design awards, their vast collection of home products is both unique and minimalistic. MRP Rs.2995.00 (inclusive of all taxes)

name: Ella Round Tealight Holders, Set of 2 - Olive
description: Add a soft glow to your decor with these two tealight holders Crafted from high-quality glass, these tealight holders can be used for tealights and decorative candles as well. Shaped like a semi-circle, each one has a generous divot on top to place the candles. Colored in a charming olive hue, this set of two tealight holders can be placed in any corner of your home. They have a compact style that will fit onto most mantlepieces, side tables and desks. You can also use these tealight holders to keep your succulents or crystals Dimensions of Each Dia. 10.3 cm, H 5.5 cm Material Glass Made in India Clean with a dry cloth Comes packed in a brown box Product Content 2 Tealight Holders (candle not included) About the brand Launched in 2021, ESQ Living is a homeware label developed by the team at MQ. The collection offers minimal and stylish accessories with a focus on functionality &amp affordable luxury. Contemporary yet timeless designs are paired with subtle tones to create products that are ideal for the modern Indian home. MRP Rs.899.00 (inclusive of all taxes)

name: Prism Glass Tealight Holder - Gold
description: Combining glass and metal in a beautiful geometric design, this tealight holder is a perfect accent for any space in your home. It is a sophisticated accent in the daytime with its gold finish and prism-inspired shape. While at night with a candle lit inside, it creates a mesmerizing glow with the reflections from the glass and shadows from the metal edges. Made from premium crystal glass, it plays beautifully with light, casting a soft and inviting glow when lit. Its geometric form adds a contemporary edge, while the crystal finish lends a touch of luxury that feels both subtle and sophisticated. Use it solo for a minimalist look or pair it with other crystal pieces to create a glowing ensemble that instantly elevates your home décor.
